root: ^This is a fine time for grain to be going
^somewhere other than the capital! What if
^a crop fails on top of this?
^And why is our produce in Crete?! Knossos
^is acting like this is my fault!
^You! Make something go away! I can only
^put out so many fires. Either rein in the
^We can’t lose any more trading partners!
^If we still have both of these problems
^The depth of my displeasure will be beyond what you can imagine.
